item.title: Network Protocals
item.description: In Progress.. TCP(Transmission Control Protocal) Description : TCP provides reliable, ordered, and error-checked delivery of a stream of octets (bytes) between applications running on hosts communicating via an IP network UDP(User Datagram Protocal) Description - provides a connectionless datagram service that emphasizes reduced latency over reliability. protocal - UDP port - NA Encryption - Ping protocal - Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)
